CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function doNpmCommand is vulnerable to command injection. This is because it constructs a command string with user-supplied input (options.npmCommand, options.cmdArgs, options.cmdOptions) and then executes it using the exec function. An attacker could potentially inject arbitrary commands by supplying specially crafted input.
